title: How much of the money that Park Wilmington collects is acutally spent on maintaining the street, and providing security in the parking lots?  And what state law authorizes the city to hire civilains to do the job assigned to the police department.  What I don\'t understand is that they can write you a ticket for parking but can\'t do anything if you get robbed or your car is broken into while sitting in their \rented\" space?"
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=5158
